SCIENCE CLASS Today in science we explored and . We carried out experiments using magnets and blowing air to put objects into motion. After that, we had some races and finished off with a game to demonstrate how magnetic fields work as a non-contact force. It was a fun and hands-on way to learn about forces and motion!

MAP TESTING MAP testing is coming up from September 22–26. If you are going to be absent on any of those days, please let me know so we can arrange for you to take the test early. To prepare for math, you can practice on Khan Academy. For reading, you can use ReadWorks, take AR quizzes, and read as much as you can. For science and social studies, you can review your textbooks and read nonfiction books. Let’s all be ready and do our best.

Upcoming Tests Friday, September 19 - Science Topic 1 test Tuesday, September 23rd - Language Arts - Grammar Workshop Unit 1 L1-8 Monday, September 29th - Social Studies - Topic 1 Spanish Tomorrow there will be a test in Spanish.
